name: TacoGaming
body:
### Welcome to TacoGaming!
We're a friendly community who likes to chat about games, music and lots more. We try and host a game night every weekend with different games. 

### Join Today!
[Click here to join TacoGaming!](https://discord.gg/0uRDy7Btjh4Nz1vk)

### Partnered Servers
We <3 the following servers
[Discord-Poltics](https://discord.gg/0uQnhPAemJQmQVo0) - The best place to talk about politics, small friendly community.
[/r/Android](https://discordapp.com/invite/0dcWZ7pE6pSSZNKP) - Talk about Android and more with a large knowledgeable community. 

### Admin
* tinytaco#7409

### Mods
* BitQuote
* RydgeBack
* SuperLemrick


### Bots
We use TacoBot on our server which provides us loads of fun commands, when you join you will be PM'ed a list of commands.

We also have TacoPoints, a karma system for Discord. You can upvote someone with @user <"^", "+1", or "up">, and give 10 of your own points with @user gild. You'll lose points for doing bad things, and get a reward for being the most active user at the end of the week.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with anything or anyone? Just simply PM or @ any of the mods or admins! :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
